inclusion.criterion: Laboratory evidence of subclinical hypothyroidism (TSH levels 4-25 mU/L and normal T4 values) in at least two following tests (one month apart from each other)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: high TSH levels (15 mU/L), low free T4 levels (0.18 ng/dl)

inclusion.criterion: Laboratory evidence of subclinical hypothyroidism (TSH levels 4-25 mU/L and normal T4 values) in at least two following tests (one month apart from each other)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: myocardial infarction, cerebrovascular event or angiography with stent placement
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: serious infection in the month before recruitment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: any use of contrast media in the last 6 months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: loss of more than 5% of body weight during the last 6 months
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 16-year-old girl with Hashimoto disease, complaining of weight gain and abnormal menstrual cycles.
